pages.text: An imperfect ritual that induces extreme hunger in the user. This ritual drastically reduces your food level, leaving you ravenous.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place a Bone Block on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 500 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual has no persistent effect; it activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone to:$(li)Set your food level to 1$(li)Set saturation to 10$(li)Play an ominous sound$(li)The stone remains for reuse$(br2)$(bold)Use Cases:$()$(li)Prepare for food-based buffs$(li)Test hunger mechanics$(li)Strategic hunger management$(br2)$(bold)Warning:$() Be prepared with food before activating!$(br2)$(italic)The price of hunger.$()
